title: New York Evening Journal

renewed-contributions.title: Prince Valiant
renewed-contributions.note: Listed as work for hire by Hal Foster as an employee of King Features Syndicate.  King Features is the author for copyright purposes.

renewed-contributions.title: Prince Valiant
renewed-contributions.note: Listed as work for hire by Hal Foster as an employee of King Features Syndicate.  King Features is the author for copyright purposes.

additional-note: The two renewals above are the only contribution renewals specifically mentioning the New York [Evening] Journal before it merged with the American.  However, King Features was also renewing copyrights from 1933 onward for publications that included its syndicated comics and other features.  Such features appearing in the Journal would also most likely be covered by those copyrights.
